MajorClaims.Text: there are many things in the past that we can learn about, such as mistakes, success and knowledge in many fields of study
the past's mistakes, success and knowledge all have crucial impact on people's lives today

Claims.Text: past obviously saves ourselves a bunch of failures and times
people's success in the past is as significant as those mistakes
the past is the basis in which people can use to develope new knowledge, inventions

Premises.Text: As everyone's life is too short to risk trying anything without any prepare, we all should learn about other's mistakes
we can avoid making the same ones
Each mistake, from the smallest to the bigger one, is a treasure of experience, which, if we can make full use of, will make us well-prepared for many complicated situations of our life
the predecessors' mistakes are the first thing that we should consider when learning about the past
others' accomplishment can be served as the direct way
If the predecessors' mistakes are the indirect way that leads us to the goals
By looking into the ways other people use to achieve their targets, we have the chance to make those mine, put them into practice and, of course, be successful like them
Edison's statement "Genius is 1 percent inspiration and 99 percent perspiration" is still helpful for everyone today, and probably in the future
If it had not been for those knowledge in the past, we could never be as modern as today
How can America be the world's leading country if Columbus did not accidentally discover it in his search for India
How can the comtemporary scientists study the earth's gravity without the apple which fall on Newton's head
They are only some of many precious knowledge that the past presents us
We cannot ignore them in any way
